item.title: ::pickup help!
item.dc:creator: @ilikesanta15 ilikesanta15
item.description:
@ilikesanta15 wrote:

when i go to pick something up with the command ::pickup i have to do like
::pickup 00995 1000 for 1k coins, i want it so i can do ::pickup 995 1000 for 1k coins please help heres what mine looks like…

else if (command.startsWith("pickup ") && (playerRights >= 0)) {
try {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,12));
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13));
if (/*newItemID <= 30000 && */newItemID >= 0) {
addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
} else {
sendMessage(“That Item Doesn’t Exist.”);
}
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage("Cmon Type IT AGIAN ! ");
}

Read full topic
